sourcesContent:
import * as Yup from 'yup'

export const validationSchema = Yup.object().shape({
    firstName:Yup.string()
        .min(2,'too Short!')
        .max(50,'too Long!')
        .required('Required'),
    lastName:Yup.string()
        .min(2,'too Short!')
        .max(50,'too Long!')
        .required('Required'),
    email: Yup.string()
        .email('Enter valid Email')
        .required('Required'),
    password: Yup.string()
        .min(8, 'Too Short!')
        .required('Required')
   
});
